name: Macaw's files
tagline: Components, snippets, templates and more for Macaw users.
body:
# Hi
Since I'm one of the moderator of the official [forum of Macaw](http://forum.macaw.co) I oftenly tried to help some users of [Macaw](http://macaw.co) who can sometimes stuck on simple things (or complicated ones) by giving them some example files and some explanations.

Macaw is better used with the help of minium knowledge in HTML and CSS but you can design simple website without.
Macaw is best used to quick wireframes but you can use it for other things, like some prototype, even complicated ones. For that we must work around the limitationsâ€¦ it's a bit outside the box and Macaw loses some values but can be useful to export a good looking CSS file.
I also noticed that Macaw helped a lots of users to understand HTML and CSS thanks to its awesome UI.

Here, you'll find some ready to use components, example files or even full templates.

If you have a specific problem, ask me directly in the forum.

Thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
